forum.content:
How often do you think about why your friends came into your life?
你想過為什麼你的朋友走進你的生活嗎?
Was it random,by design,or maybe a little of both?
是偶然,是注定還是兩著揭示
Regardless of the reason some friends you just know are gonna be by your side for a while.
不管什麼原因,一些朋友將只會在你的身邊陪伴你一段時間

Others,you're not sure And then there's that one friend who,well,you hope someday becomes somehing more.
但有那麼一個特殊的朋友,你會希望有一天你們的关系會超出普通朋友
But"friends"will have to do for now.
(但現在普通朋友就行了)
And that's ok,I guess.(應該吧)
forum.title: 如果我有這樣的朋友就好了
